answers.answer: HI Frances,welcome back.You just avoid sugars and strictly limit carbs.Please also exercise.Montitor your sugars and adjust what you eat based on how your blood sugars react to certain meals.

question: I have been diagnosed with pre-diabetes.  Yes, I am over-weight!  My questions are how do I know what is right/not right to eat?  How can I prevent it from becoming full blown diabetes??Thanks for the help!
title: Im pre-diabetic and need help...
